channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0256; 06:08AM; 6417 S Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GaFyHj; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. Fortunately, despite the initial, unconfirmed reports of persons possibly inside the structure the search conducted by firefighters located no occupants. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 E57 RA21 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0256; 05:48AM; 6417 S Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GaFyHj; Florence; One story, single family dwelling (boarded) with heavy fire showing from the attic and *unconfirmed* reports of person(s) possibly inside. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are no other structures exposed.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E57 RA21 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Knockdown; INC#0196; 04:30AM; 6842 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sQFOIe; #Hollywood; Two-story vacant commercial building with fire showing. The first 34 firefighters operating in the offensive mode extinguished flames consuming the structure in 14 minutes (4:44am). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E3 E41 E61 E76 E82 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA3 RA803 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0175; 03:46AM; 200 N Gaffey St; MAP: https://bit.ly/47qlnB5; #SanPedro; Thirty-four firefighters responded to extinguish flames inside of a one-story single family home (suspected vacant) in 20 minutes (4:06am). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E112 E248 E285 E36 E48 RA101 RA36 RA848 T48 T85; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1421; 07:47PM; 228 E 9th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/40NtXap; #DowntownLA; In less than 10 minutes from arrival on scene, firefighters extricated the patient (who had a lower extremity trapped under the vehicle) and transported him to a local hospital in moderate-to-serious condition. LAPD Inc #3441. Nothing further.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E11 E209 E210 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA13 RA15 RA17 RA810 RA9 T10 T9; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1421; 07:32PM; 228 E 9th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/40NtXap; #DowntownLA; One patient (adult male) trapped under a vehicle. Firefighters are setting up extrication operations to free the man.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E11 E209 E210 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA13 RA15 RA17 RA810 RA9 T10 T9; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1247; 05:43PM; 1401 N Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G7eecT; #Wilmington; A traffic collision resulted in 5 patients needing medical care and hospital transport by LAFD personnel. No further details are available (unknown age/gender/condition/situation). LAPD Inc #3035.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E238 E38 RA38 RA833 RA848 RA85 RA865 T38; CH4; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hoist Rescue; INC#1114; 04:22PM; Haines Canyon Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MPTSJ2; #Tujunga; Firefighter-Paramedics have made contact with an injured bicycle rider (31-year-old male) in a remote area of Haines Canyon. LAFD Air Operations will be hoisting the patient and transporting to a local hospital in moderate-to-serious condition. Nothing further.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 E24 E274 H3 H7 HA3 HA7 PB74 RA74 RA874 RH114 T74; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0411; 08:04AM; 420 S Av 20; MAP: https://bit.ly/40N9hQb; #LincolnHeights; Thirty-six LAFD firefighters responded to fire in a one-story single family home. It took 16 minutes to extinguish the flames, using a coordinated attack between interior attack and rooftop ventilation. Crews conducted a thorough search and found that all occupants had gotten out of the structure prior to FD arrival. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E2 E201 E202 E4 EA1 RA1 RA801 SO1 SQ21 T1 T2; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0411; 07:48AM; 422 S Av 20; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G67WKx; #LincolnHeights; One-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E2 E201 E202 E4 RA1 RA801 SQ21 T1 T2; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange
